definition: (once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
Youhao district of Yichun city 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang
Youhao district of Yichun city 伊春市[Yi1 chun1 shi4], Heilongjiang
member of same class, team, work group etc/teammate
close friend/pal/(social networking website) friend/CL:個|个[ge4]
good friend/(slang) a visit from Aunt Flo (menstrual period)

sentences.english: "More than 50 of them used to be my workmates, " added Fan.
sentences.chinese: 他還補充道，“有50多戶都曾是我的伐木工友。”

sentences.english: We are willing to conduct sincere cooperation with you, seek common development and make friends through business.
sentences.chinese: 我們願與您真誠合作，以商會友，共同發展。

sentences.english: Keep only cheerful friends. The grouches pull you down.
sentences.chinese: 與快樂的人爲友，心懷不滿的人會讓你消沉。

sentences.english: Two friends were at a party held at the mansion of a billionaire.
sentences.chinese: 兩位友人蔘加了一個在億萬富翁的豪宅裏舉行的聚會。

sentences.english: The golf buddies start to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 其他幾位高爾夫球友哈哈笑了起來。

sentences.english: Cummer was pregnant. The word of first time abort, can friendly sequela ?
sentences.chinese: 女友懷孕了。第一次打胎的話，會不會友後遺症？

sentences.english: Friends chatting in, people ask, "Where work is still published?"
sentences.chinese: 友聊天兒，人問起“作品還在哪裏發表？”

sentences.english: A man in vicious company is among his enemies.
sentences.chinese: 一個人在壞的羣體，就如與敵爲友。

sentences.english: May 001 bring you joy, love and peace.
sentences.chinese: 願001年爲帶來歡樂，友和寧靜。

sentences.english: Better lose a jest than a friend.
But Yang and Chen have their reasons.
sentences.chinese: 但是楊和陳友他們自己的理由。

sentences.english: You can kvetch all you want about Hugo SAYING that he considers Gaddafi a friend.
sentences.chinese: 你可以大罵雨果查韋斯稱視卡扎菲爲友。

sentences.english: True renju friends, they do not care about politics.
sentences.chinese: 真正的五子棋友，他們不會關心政治。

sentences.english: whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God.
sentences.chinese: 所以凡想要與世俗爲友的，就是與神爲敵了。

sentences.english: His wife and children parents together the happiness of a family union, and friend wine lotus word poetry.
sentences.chinese: 與妻兒父母齊天倫之樂，與朋友友把酒忘憂言詩詞。

sentences.english: Monseigneur was out at a little supper most nights, with fascinating company.
sentences.chinese: 大人大多數晚上都要跟美豔的友伴們外出使餐。

old friend/sb who passed the county level imperial exam (in Ming dynasty)
senior male fellow student or apprentice/son (older than oneself) of one's teacher
younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)
